##### Load Packages
```{r Packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(downloader)
library(readxl)
```

```{r Load Data}
SoloData <- tibble(read.csv("solo-artist-followers.csv"))
head(SoloData)
BillboardData <- tibble(read.csv("billboard-hits.csv"))
head(BillboardData)
```

All data types seem to be imported correctly.

```{r Filter}
BillboardData <- BillboardData %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  filter(n() >= 6)
view(BillboardData)
```
